sentences.sentence: I would not expect to see this approach change as the sector liberalises.
sentences.translation: 我不希望看到这种方法随着行业放开而改变。

sentences.sentence: As Mexico City liberalises, much of the rest of the country is moving in the opposite direction.
sentences.translation: 就在墨西哥城变得更加自由的同时，这个国家的其他地方却在反其道而行之。
